params.manager: The address to add as match manager

params.matchIds: Array of match IDs to cancel

batchClaimWinnings(uint256[]).details: Skips matches that can't be claimed (doesn't revert entire tx)

params.matchIds: Array of match IDs to claim from

returns.potentialPayout: The potential payout if this outcome wins

returns.matchId: The ID of the created match

emergencyPause().details: Allows bot to stop the bleeding if something goes wrong

getBatchClaimableAmounts(address,uint256.details: This is more efficient than calling getClaimableAmount() multiple times

params.matchIds: Array of match IDs to check

returns.amounts: Array of claimable amounts (0 if not claimable)
returns.statuses: Array of claim statuses (0=not claimable, 1=claimable, 2=already claimed)

returns.status: ClaimStatus struct with canClaim, claimType, amount

getClaimableAmount(uint256,address).details: Returns the exact amount that was/will be paid out, using same calculation as claimWinnings()

returns.payoutAmount: The actual ETH payout (0 if not claimable)

getMatchFinancials(uint256).details: Useful for analytics and verifying all claims have been processed

returns.platformFee: Fee amount taken (or to be taken)

getMatches(uint256[]).details: Useful for batch loading in bot/frontend

params.matchIds: Array of match IDs to fetch

returns.homeOdds: Draw odds Away odds (in basis points)

returns.total: Home pool Draw pool Away pool

params.matchIds: Array of match IDs to check

returns.claimableMatches: Array of match IDs with unclaimed winnings

returns._0: Bet struct with user's bet details
bool True if user has bet

initializeV2().details: Called once after upgrade from V1 to V2

returns._0: bool True if address is a match manager

params.matchId: The ID of the match to pause

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.matchId: The ID of the match to bet on
params.prediction: The predicted outcome (HOME, DRAW, or AWAY)

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params.result: The match outcome (HOME, DRAW, or AWAY)

params.matchId: The ID of the match to unpause

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

accumulatedFees().notice: Accumulated platform fees available for withdrawal

batchClaimRefunds(uint256[]).notice: Claim refunds from multiple cancelled matches (V2)

batchClaimWinnings(uint256[]).notice: Claim winnings from multiple matches in one transaction (V2)

calculatePotentialWinnings(uint256,uint8.notice: Calculate potential winnings for a hypothetical bet

cancelMatch(uint256,string).notice: Cancel a match and enable refunds

claimRefund(uint256).notice: Claim refund for a cancelled match

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings for a resolved match

closeBetting(uint256).notice: Close betting for a match (usually called at kickoff)

createMatch(string,string,string,uint256.notice: Create a new match for betting

emergencyPause().notice: Emergency pause - bot can pause but only owner can unpause

getBatchClaimableAmounts(address,uint256.notice: Get claimable amounts for a user across multiple matches in one call (V2)

getBetCounts(uint256).notice: Get number of bets for each outcome

getClaimStatus(uint256,address).notice: Get claim status for a user on a match (V2)

getClaimableAmount(uint256,address).notice: Get the exact claimable amount for a user on a specific match (V2)

getMatchFinancials(uint256).notice: Get comprehensive financial summary for a match (V2)

getMatches(uint256[]).notice: Get multiple matches in one call (V2)

getOdds(uint256).notice: Get current odds for a match (in basis points, 10000 = 1x)

getPools(uint256).notice: Get pool amounts for a match

getUnclaimedWinnings(address,uint256[]).notice: Get all unclaimed winnings for a user (V2)

getUserBet(uint256,address).notice: Get a user's bet for a specific match

hasBet(uint256,address).notice: Match ID => User address => Has user bet on this match

hasUserBet(uint256,address).notice: Check if a user has bet on a match

initialize(address).notice: Initialize the contract (replaces constructor for upgradeable) - V1

isMatchManager(address).notice: Check if an address is a match manager

lockUpgrades().notice: Permanently lock the contract from future upgrades

matchPaused(uint256).notice: Match ID => Is match paused (individual pause)

matchTotalClaimed(uint256).notice: Match ID => Total amount claimed for this match (tracking)

placeBet(uint256,uint8).notice: Place a bet on a match outcome

resolveMatch(uint256,uint8).notice: Resolve a match with the final result

setStakeLimits(uint256,uint256).notice: Update minimum and maximum stake amounts

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new address

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract (only owner, not match managers)

userBets(uint256,address).notice: Match ID => User address => User's bet
